item.title: How to Build Augmented Reality App using Unity and ARCore SDK
item.description: Hello everyone, In this tutorial, I’ll walk through how to build an Augmented reality app using Unity and Google ARCore SDK. First of all, I will cover some core concepts, then jump into the project setup(Hardware + Software Requirements) and then to code. ######CORE CONCEPTS Augmented Reality:- It is a technology that superimposes a computer-generated image on a user’s view of the real world, thus providing a composite view. ARCore:- ARCore is a software development kit(SDK) developed by Google for creating an augmented reality app.
